name: Repaired Broken Heart Pendant for Necklace in .999 Fine Silver
description:
Happy accident?! After I fired the first pmc heart out of the mold it was curved so I hit it with a hammer like I usually do with metal…and broke the broken heart in 2 pieces. So, it needed some repair work. 

The original was reinforced in the rear with a sterling silver Silversmyth tag soldered across the crack and in the front with a Band-aid. I ended up lending the original to a friend going through a tough time.  She's all better now but, there is no way she's giving it back.  

It you like it then you ought to put a ring on it… 

I mean if you like it I made a mold of it and I can make more.  

Hearts are Fine Silver .999, Jumpring is Sterling Silver.
Now completely available for purchase!  I make each one at a time so, allow up 2 weeks for delivery.  

The necklace will arrive with an adjustable dark brown leather cord but you'll probably want to move it to another more permanent chain for the long haul because life has it's bumps in the road.

The individual photo (that has grass in it) is of the original... the picture of two is what they look like molded up in fine silver.

email: info@silversmyth.com

name: Wise Old Owl on Brown Leather Cord in Fine Silver
description:
I hand carved this adorable owl and made a mold however each piece is hand finished and additional carving is done before the final product is fired.  

I will place the owl on and adjustable leather cord but you can switch it out to any chain you like.  

Each owl weighs approximately 5.5 grams.

This fine Silver Owl is only available through this website.

name: Sterling Silver Cuff Bracelet
description:
Made from 20 gauge sterling silver (.925) this gorgeous cuff bracelet is handmade by Julie Hiltbrunner of Silversmyth Jewelry. Each will have some unique hammer details as it is lovingly handmade.  

It is engraveable.  For engraving:  add this product to your cart:  http://silversmyth.bigcartel.com/product/custom-engraving and select the number of characters. Specify the words in the Seller Instructions during checkout.  On this item interior or exterior engraving is available, please specify.  

It is stamped "Sterling" and "Silversmyth" on the interior.

Email: info@silversmyth.com with any questions.

name: Hammered Sterling Silver Band Ring
description:
100% Solid Sterling Silver Band Ring

I make each of these from a length of sterling silver wire, form into a ring and solder the ends together.  Each ring is hammered by hand enhancing the silver's reflective beauty.

The ring is approximately 3mm wide by 1.7mm deep.  

You know those jewelry pieces that you put on and never want to take off? That's what this is. Let's just call it your "Stick it on, look great, and forget it ring."

That's a bit long though. You will love this ring for years to come. 

Edges are rounded to make it comfortable for everyday wear.

name: Chunky Sterling Silver Infinity Ring
description:
The Chunky Infinity Ring was made by special request for a customer.  I liked it so much I made a mold and can get it cast up for you in your size. 

Add this item to cart for custom engraving:  http://silversmyth.bigcartel.com/product/custom-engraving

Please use the Seller Instructions during checkout to instruct me on the characters to engrave or email me at Info@silversmyth.com.

I'll keep standard sizes in stock and other sizes will be available by special request and may have longer lead times.  

Arrives in a ribbon wrapped presentation gift box.

**THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER ALLOW 30 DAYS.***

Email: Info@silversmyth.com with special requests.

name: Custom Engraving
description:
Hand engraving by Julie Hiltbrunner.  

Please email: Info@silversmyth.com with any questions.  I will reply promptly. 

If you can write it with a pen I can probably engrave it onto or into your Silversmyth jewelry in my handwriting style.  

A heart symbol is considered 1 character.  Engraving is $2 per character.  Select from the drop box the number of characters you will need.

Examples of engraving are shown in the photos.  (The exact items in the photos have already been custom made and shipped.)

Please email the specific text and placement for the engraving to: info@silversmyth.com  or add it to the SELLER INSTRUCTIONS during checkout.

I only engrave silver pieces purchased from me and that have room to engrave on them.  

If I don't see the jewelry you want please let me know via email.  I do create custom jewelry by request.  Examples can be seen by following this link: http://www.flickr.com/photos/silversmyth

name: Sterling Silver Infinity Wedding or Promise Ring
description: These Infinity wedding bands were initially hand-fabricated which means they weren’t carved from a Computer Aided Design (CAD) and then cast. The band is 3mm wide (as shown in photo) and fitted for comfort. And now a 4mm wide ring for the guys available. Custom Infinity Wedding Band Design by Silversmyth Artisan jewelry is so beautiful because of it’s unique handmade look. Custom engraving is available for the interior of this ring. Custom Engraving Here’s how they were crafted: Two small round rings, one slightly larger than the other were formed from sterling silver wire. They were solder closed, stretched into ovals and twisted into infinity symbols. Round wire was rolled through a half-round channel in a rolling mill to make the inside of the ring flat and the outside rounded. The wire was shaped into ring bands and then each end was soldered to each the end of the infinity symbols, one at a time. As these rings have gained in popularity I have moved on to casting them using the lost wax process. All finish work is done by hand by Silversmyth. Each band was stamped, .925, which means the pure silver content is .925% (also known as sterling silver.) The rings were then filed down and polished to a high shine. This listing is for a single Infinity band. Hand engraving is $2 per letter or symbol. Link to engraving options: http://www.silversmyth.bigcartel.com/product/custom-engraving For questions and engraving please Email: info@silversmyth.com or call Silversmyth at 817.456.4432 Like Silversmyth on Facebook: http://facebook.com/silversmyth

name: Silversmyth Cowgirl Silver Horseshoe Necklace
description:
Each of these horseshoe necklaces is lovingly handcrafted from PMC or Precious Metal Clay that when fired becomes fine silver. 

Fine silver is .999 pure silver whereas sterling silver is .925 Silver and .075 Copper.

Fine silver doesn't tarnish.  The chain on this necklace is sterling silver and so are the findings and the Silversmyth tag.  

This necklace is to be featured in a magazine Aug/Sept.  Wish me luck!!  

The necklace is 18".  It can also be worn as 20" length if you employ the extender.  

What you will love about this necklace is that the pendant is attached at each side to the chain so the clasp won't be constantly ending up in the front.  You're welcome!  

A bit of silver-black is used in the recesses to show detail.

A BIG thanks to my cousin Anne for commissioning the first of these horseshoe necklaces! 

If you'd like to inspire a new design or for any questions please don't hesitate to email: Info@silversmyth.com 

Allow 1-2 weeks for delivery inside the USA.
Thanks!

name: Silversmyth 5 Intertwined Sterling Silver Bangles Bracelet
description:
The beauty of these bangles being intertwined is that one random bracelet will not get lost or ride up the arm by itself.

Five Intertwined Sterling Silver Bangles with Silversmyth tag. 

Material:  100% Sterling Silver.  

Surface: Hammer forged, tumbled for durability or shine and shape.

Select from: Child (doesn't include tag for safety), Small, Medium, or Large.  Interior diameter Approx. 2" (child), 2.25"(small), 2.5" (Medium) , 2.75" Large.

name: Wide Band Infinity Ring in Sterling Silver
description: Custom crafted wide band infinity ring. Please get sized in a jewelry store for an 8mm wide ring. The text shown is an example of my hand engraving. This ring is 8mm wide and made from 20ga sterling silver sheet and a hand crafted wire infinity is soldered to the face. The second picture shows a size 6 ladies infinity band with a size 12 men's WIDE band infinity ring. Engraving is $2 per letter and is available here: Custom Engraving

name: Perfect Little Band Ring in Sterling Silver
description:
Recipe:

One Part Love plus Two Parts Kisses...

This ring starts its little life as 10 gauge round sterling silver wire.  I run it through my rolling mill into a lovely half round wire.  I wrap that wire around my steel ring mandrel and mark where to cut it to your exact size.  

Then I file the ends nice and flat and fit them together.  I solder the join shut and shape it perfectly round.  Then I use hammers and files to get the surface just right.  

I use several polishing tools to smooth and polish it, then it's good to go... unless you want to have it engraved.  Hover over a pic of an engraved ring in the online store and you can find an option for custom engraving.  

During checkout you can add the actual words to engrave in the Seller Instructions box.  Or email me.  

I do it all by hand unless you have a fancy script in mind.  If that's the case just shoot me an email to: 

Info@silversmyth.com 

I'll be happy to let you know if your special engraving will fit and what the cost will be.

The one shown was a tiny 4.25 for my sister's teenie tiny little fingers.  The band is about 3mm wide and 2mm deep and made to order.  Most orders are in and out in under a week.  But if you have any questions or special requests please don't hesitate to ask.

name: Sterling Silver Book Charm
description:
The book charm is about 1/2" tall.  100% .925 Sterling Silver.  
This book charm was originally hand carved by me in wax.  The lost wax process is used to cast these books.

Before placing your order please email me your engraving specifications and I will promptly reply as to whether there is enough space to accomodate your characters.  

Engraving also is available on the reverse.  Usually people have put publication dates on the rear.

Email: Info@silversmyth.com

Please find the separate product listed as CUSTOM ENGRAVING to add the number of engraved characters you want on the book.  The books will ALWAYS be machine engraved.  The price is the same as hand engraving on this product.

I have these books cast by a casting company as needed so please allow between 20 to 30 days for delivery.

name: Sterling Silver and Cubic Zirconia Tower Ring
description: A stunning 8 millimeter CZ that is fully protected around the edges by polished sterling silver sits atop this lovely hand carved ring shank.  This ring has a solid feel and looks rather more valuable than the price.  This ring is size 7.  (If you need another size please email info@silversmyth.com with your requirements.)  There is plenty of space to engrave the interior.  Machine engraving or hand engraving is available.

name: Solid Sterling Silver Scoop Ring
description:
This classic and elegant ring is a hand carved and only available from Silversmyth. 

The entire interior is engraveable as none of the silver has been hollowed out which is not something you often find in mass produced jewelry. 

The sizes listed are currently made and ready to ship. 

For other sizes please email me at: info@silversmyth.com.  I'll have one custom cast just for you!

You will love the decadent weight of this ring.

name: Solid Sterling Silver Angle Ring
description:
Another Silversmyth Exclusive Ring.  Handcarved design.
This shiny ring is solid sterling silver.  This interior is flat and fully engraveable.  This is the kind of ring you can wear everyday and never take off.  

If you don't see the size you need listed, email info@silversmyth.com to have one in your size custom made for you.

name: Sterling Silver Twist Ring
description:
This is a great ring for stacking with other sterling silver and gemstone rings.  

The Twist Ring is not so simple as to be called plain but not so busy to be called gaudy.  It's juuust right.

Arrives in lovely presentation box.

Whole and half sizes.  Ring is bout 2.5-3mm wide.

REVIEW~"I got it - Thank you so much! It fits perfectly and is beautifullllllll!"  Kerrie C. - Fort Worth, TX

name: Elegant Sterling Silver Spiral Earrings
description: Handcrafted sterling silver earrings work great for ladies with medium to long necks. This pair's not for the short necked people... ha ha! I said, "necked." These are my best selling earrings. I liked them so much I kept the first pair I made for myself. People ask me and my customers about them almost every time we wear them. I always say "thanks I made them myself..." which makes for a great ice breaker. But you can say, "Thanks, I had Silversmyth make them for me." Approximately 2 inches long. Each pair is made individually so the spirals match, equal and opposite (if that makes sense!) They are easy to put on and take off. If you have a shorer neck, I am happy to create earrings to your specifications to accomodate your specific needs. contact us

name: Amethyst Trillion in Sterling Silver
description:
Beautiful 8mm Trillion Amethyst from Brazil in substantial sterling silver setting.  Ring was handcarved from wax by Julie Hiltbrunner and cast.  Silver runs all around the edge of the stone and offers excellent protection for the stone.

This ring is classic and will never go out of style.

Interior is engraveable.  Other sizes may be available.  
Email: info@silversmyth.com

Size: 6.5

name: Infinite Love Necklace in Sterling Silver
description:
Love written out in wire in an infinity symbol loop.  Necklace is 18" and at end of an extender is a sterling silver Silversmyth tag.

Each is custom made to order so please allow 2 weeks.  

Email: info@silversmyth.com with questions or for a rush order.  

100% Sterling Silver.

name: One-of-a-Kind Ladder Necklace with Gemstones
description:
This one of a kind necklace comes with 16" 8 sided snake chain.  Not shown.  If you want a different option... contact: Info@silversmyth.com  Different options have different pricing.

Materials:  
Sterling Silver
Amethyst
Peridot
Simulated Labradorite
Citrine
Lab Grown Ruby

name: personalized sterling silver baby rings necklace (includes 3 rings and 18" chain)
description: The price of $119 includes 3 rings personalized with names or words of your choosing, 18" eight sided snake chain, and Silversmyth tag. Makes a great gift for the proud mother or grandmother. Please email your names/words and any specifications: Contact us with your specifications. Also, please include the names/words for additional baby rings and you will be emailed a Paypal bill for $32 per additional ring. Each ring is 3/8ths inch diameter. Stamped and handformed in the Silversmyth studio. All components including the Silversmyth tag are (.925) sterling silver. The lettering is oxidized (blackened) to highlight the names. Silversmyth is happy to customize chain to the lengths of your choosing. If there is any way we can better customize this item to your liking, please ask. Email: info@silversmyth.com or call 817.456.4432 This item is not for children or babies due to small parts. Makes a great gift for the proud mother, dad or grandmother. For Dads: please email us so we can create a leather cord necklace with sterling clasp and findings. The leather looks much better than a snake chain on a guy. I made a set of these for a UPS driver who lives an hour away on Christmas Eve! He drove to my studio after a late running shift (delivering last minute Christmas packages) to pick up the necklace. It was snowing like crazy. It took him 4 hours driving back on ice to surprise his mother (the kid's grandmother) Christmas morning. I heard she was so touched she cried. That was last Christmas (2009). First white Christmas anybody could remember in North Texas.

name: Love is Patient Hand Carved Sterling Silver Ring Size 7
description: This ring was hand carved and cast in sterling silver. This exact ring is available in a 7 but I'd be happy to carve it in different sizes if there is a demand. Email: info@silversmyth.com Custom Engraving is available for the interior. Custom Engraving

name: Sterling Silver Wolf Rhino Elephant Cow Butterfly Sea Turtle Bat Frog Alligator Earrings
description:
For a limited time you can get fun animal earrings.  I found these great hand-painted miniature rubber animals and turned them into wearable art by adding sterling silver components. Hand formed sterling silver (.925) french ear wires. The animals are beautifully sculpted.  

Select which animal you would like from the drop down menu.

Select what length earrings you would like by letting me know in the Seller Instructions box during checkout.  Select a length between 1" and 2.5".  

This listing is for one pair of sterling silver and rubber animal earrings.

Materials: Earwires and chains are sterling silver, animal is rubber and paint.

Cleaning instructions:  Dip chains and ear wires into commercially available silver jewelry cleaner or wipe with a polishing cloth.  

Contact: info@silversmyth.com with any questions.  I am happy to help.  Custom designs available.  

I only have one pair of each in stock and then they will be gone.

name: The Photographer's Camera Charm
description:
A lovely solid fine silver camera charm.  Each one is handcrafted by Julie Hiltbrunner for Silversmyth.  The charm comes with a jumpring to attach it to your charm bracelet.  

The resessed areas on the camera body have been blacked like a real camera.  The lens area is beveled in and has a hole drilled right through to the back as a fun touch so you can actually see through the camera. 

Buy just the charm for $98 or the charm on a chain as pictured for $120-128.

The charm is (.999) fine silver and weighs 2.5 grams and approximately 3/8" wide, 1/8" deep,  3/8" high

The chain, tag and clasp is (.925) sterling silver.


Slight variations will occur due to the hand-carved nature of this item.

name: Sterling Silver Pill Bug or Roly Poly Charm
description:
Hand carved design with exterior armour detail and some leg detail on the interior.  This lovely little bug charm is approximately 12mm long and 8mm high.  It comes with a jump ring (not pictured) to attach it to a charm bracelet.  

Little kids have been known to play with these harmless bugs because when you touch them they roll up into a perfect little ball as a defense mechanism.  

These charms are made to order so allow a month for delivery.

Silversmyth exclusive design.
